options.modifiers.once: Will only invoke the provided user callback once, then directive will be unbound.
options.modifiers.attr: Sets the value of [attributes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserverInit/attributes) to true.
options.modifiers.child: Sets the value of [childList](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserverInit/childList) to true.
options.modifiers.char: Sets the value of [characterData](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserverInit/characterData) to true.
options.modifiers.sub: Sets the value of [subtree](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserver/observe#Parameters) to true.
options.value: The function to invoke when the target element is updated.
